alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Buckeye, Avondale; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 11:11AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through NOON MST... At 1111 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buckeye, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Surprise, Buckeye and White Tank Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 109 and 113. AZ Route 85 near mile marker 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Buckeye, Avondale; Tonopah Desert
